paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted one pathogenic variant in the BRCA2 gene with associated penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma

individual_records.phenotype_details: Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma
individual_records.evidence_sentence: We identified three pathogenic mutations, including one within BRCA2 (p.Met1Val), among Pakistani HNSC patients.

functional_data.summary: The study revealed elevated expression levels of BRCA2 in HNSC samples harboring pathogenic mutations.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was unique to the Pakistani population studied.
key_quotes: The key discovery of our research lies in the identification of three pathogenic mutations, including one within BRCA2 (p.Met1Val).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was reported in the paper.
